Haneul is content to live the life of a rich couch potato and binge-read novels. But to her dismay, she soon finds herself stuck in a time loop where her day repeats endlessly, and the only way to escape the loop is to act like Aila Mertensia! synonyms: Your Majesty, Please Don't Kill Me Again, Pyeha, Tto Juki-jin Mara-juse-yo

synopsis:
The day 18-year-old Laliette Isabelle De Bellua died is forever etched in her mind. Her entire family already six feet under on false charges of treason, she is sent to the gallows with her sentence being handed down by the tyrannical Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum. In contrast to his ethereal beauty, he has bathed himself in blood; not even his wife was free from the carnage, falling victim to his hand on their wedding night.

After meeting her end, Laliette awakens in the past on her 12th birthday. Despite having knowledge of the grim future, the only way she can think of to save her beloved family is to endear herself to the bloodthirsty Rupert before his rise to power. There is only one problem: Rupert is currently living as a woman—the oft-forgotten "Princess Rapertte," whom no one wants to serve. With little in her pocket, Laliette runs away from home to pledge herself to Rapertte, hoping to one day earn the princess's trust and save the people she treasures.

title: Kirby
synopsis:
Kirby is an ongoing series of light novels based upon the Kirby series, written by Mie Takase, illustrated by Tau and Poto Karino, and published primarily in Japanese by Kadokawa Tsubasa Bunko. The series was originally exclusive to Japan until 2022, when the first volume was officially translated and published in French by Mana Books and the Star Allies volumes were officially translated and published in Korean. Usually, two or three new volumes are published in Japanese per year.

The books are intended for young adult readers, and as such, each volume usually consists of roughly two hundred pages, split into as few as eight to as many as sixteen chapters, not counting prologues or epilogues. A few dozen black-and-white illustrations are additionally used in each of the books to accompany specific scenes. The titles of volumes one through nine are officially localized in the Kirby Art & Style Collection book. Volumes after these are not, however, and most have only been directly translated from the original Japanese titles unofficially.

Much like in the anime, Kirby: Right Back at Ya!, the series takes place in its own unique canon that does not correlate with the games. It is much more accurate to the series overall compared to the anime series, however. Many volumes in the series take inspiration from the games by including characters, objects, and storylines from particular entries, though they do not solely take from the games, as many aspects are unique to the books just the same. Some installments take aspects from other media in the overall Kirby series, such as the real-world Kirby Café, and several merchandise series, using them as a base for more fleshed out plotlines. The series stars Kirby, King Dedede, Meta Knight, and Waddle Dee as the main characters. Kirby stars as the protagonist in most volumes, while King Dedede and Meta Knight occasionally receive their own respective novels where they are the protagonist instead. Waddle Dee is the only one of the four who hasn't starred in his own novel.

(Source: wikirby.com)

Ruby never expected to get transported into the world of a novel... least of all a spicy boys' love novel! When such a thing happens, what's a girl to do? Make the most of it by becoming a successful businesswoman running a luxury inn, of course! The money and power is one thing, but the chance to see and interact with her favorite hunky guys from the story is an added bonus. There's only one problem, and that's the mysterious, scheming villain. What was once just some brooding eye-candy is now a very real threat to Ruby's life. title: Eien no 0
synopsis:
Your grandfather was a coward.

That is the angry recollection with which a former Zero fighter pilot greets two Japanese siblings who, typically, despite being educated, know next to nothing about a defining war in the Pacific that took place within living memory. The testimony rattles and confuses aspiring lawyer Kentaro and newly minted journalist Keiko since virtually the only fact they’ve grown up hearing about Kyuzo Miyabe is that he died a kamikaze. When the young pair digs deeper into the man’s past, other surviving comrades only seem to confirm the verdict, but its very import begins to shift in surprising ways.

In addition to providing a window into the experiences of the losing side’s flyboys and a frank look at contemporary Japan’s amnesia regarding the war, this novel also undertakes a blistering critique of the folly and inhumanity of the Imperial Navy and Army and a nuanced exploration of the differences between kamikaze pilots and today’s suicide bombers. At its core, however, it is a mystery of sorts about a long-dead man’s actions and intentions and a reconfiguration of the meaning of wartime loyalty and sacrifice.

(Source: Vertical)

synopsis:
Seventeen years ago, nine Grand Masters of the Martial Arts raced to a remote mountaintop, determined to prevent a terrible prophecy. It had been foretold that on this very night, in this inhospitable place, a child would be born.

A baby girl, who in time would become the catalyst for an Apocalypse, the likes of which had not been visited upon the earth in a thousand years. In order to avoid this prophecy, the child must be destroyed. But just as the noble warriors were about to fulfill their mission...they hesitated. Now, seventeen years later, a young street fighter arrives in a bustling city. He has a knack for trouble, a lust for the ladies and a wicked fighting technique.

When he is caught peeping on the daughter of a local dojo master, a brief scuffle ends with him being taken in as a student by the wise master. All the while, a mysterious "cursed" young boy, who is not what he appears to be, is manipulating events from the shadows.

Are his intentions evil? Is he in some way connected to the ancient prophecy? And what part will our young street fighter play in all of these unfolding events? These are the questions that will be answered in this epic tale.

Feeling frustrated, he stops by a bar on his way home and meets an attractive man named Junpei. Taking a seat next to Junpei at the counter, Homare starts to talk about work and confesses that he's gay. Not only is he accepted warmly, but he discovers that Junpei is also gay... but both of them have a deep fear of emotional commitment. As they grow closer to one another, will fear get in the way of finding true happiness in love? This is a tender and sensual story of how to give love and how to be loved in return.

Luuzhu (Green Pearl) is a beautiful pearl gatherer from a small Southern village in Ancient China. Due to her family's poverty, she was sold by her parents to be the mistress of the wealthy but abusive and old Lord Hong. However, Fate is not so cruel to the gentle Luuzhu. Just before her marriage to Lord Hong, Luuzhu met a young handsome nobleman named Jilun on the beach at night. Dazzled by Luuzhu's grace, Jilun purchased her from Lord Hong for ten bushels of pearl (a most generous amount at the time). It turned out that Jilun is one of the richest man in Ancient China! However, Lord Sima Lun, who usurped the throne, now desires Luuzhu for her legendary beauty. He is even willing to go to war with Jilun for her! Will Luuzhu become just another plaything for the rich and privileged, or will she avert from that terrible fate? Or perhaps, will her celestial beauty bring woe upon her and her loved ones?

Set primarily at the beginning of Edo period of Japan (early 17th century), with anthropomorphic animals replacing humans, it features a rabbit ronin, Miyamoto Usagi, who is partially based on the famous swordsman Miyamoto Musashi. Usagi wanders the land on a musha shugyo (warrior's pilgrimage) occasionally selling his services as a bodyguard.

https://manga.fandom.com/wiki/Usagi_Yojimbo

alternative_titles.ja: キレキレ妹がデレるまで！

title: Kowashitai hodo Aisaretai

alternative_titles.ja: こわしたいほど愛されたい

synopsis:
"I can't help but fall in love with that guy. But he is a playboy. Then why can't I get my eyes off him? Why is my heart racing wildly?"

When high school year 1 student, Yajima Konomi, fall in love with her classmate, Gonshou, a true love relationship starts. An emotionally-described senseful story of a young girl.

(Source: Perfect Illusions)

title: She's Kids
synopsis: Shizuka, age 17, was raised by her mother, and the two are very close. However, the store her mom's worked hard to maintain was swindled by the Sakurasei Real Estate Company. Shizuka then, pretending to be the new wife of the president of Sakurasei, enters the Sakurasei family home while the president is away on business to get back the deed to her mom's store. In an instant she becomes "mom" to three boys, and the eldest son Kanon is the same age as her...

title: Kiri-no-Mori Hotel
synopsis:
No one knows where this hotel is, but it is a mysterious hotel where only those who take a gloomy view of life or who are getting into a blind alley could reach. Today again, "guests" who want to bury the past or even their lives are guided to "Kiri-no-Mori Hotel."

(Source: Shogakukan)

title: Cafe Junkie
synopsis:
Even though Masaru is about to graduate from a technical college pretty soon he still has no job. One and only pleasure for him is to spend time at a cafe called "Hidamari". The cafe is owned by his childhood friend's Nanami and Kurumi's parents and they are working there too. One day, he learns another one of his childhood friends is coming back to his town. He says "I wanna meet her soon.". Triggered by his word, Nanami and Kurumi start to approach him in a very different way than they ever did before...

(Source: ErogeShop edit)

title: #Teal Blue no Hairo
synopsis:
One day, Arisu Ootsuka, who is living her high school life, sees a shocking sight. Kanato Aizawa, the handsome genius who Arisu just can't beat in her studies, is with a mysterious beautiful boy...?

(Source: LINE Digital Frontier, translated)

title: Sweet Regard
synopsis:
Poor, miserable Kohei!
His cherished little sister decides to run off and get married on the sly . . . and then a freak car accident takes her out of his life for good.  As Kohei's heart struggles to mend in the wake of family tragedy, who should show up on his doorstep but his once-despised brother-in-law Shingo?  Suddenly, Kohei's days and nights are ruled by torturous nightmares . . . and a strange, sweet longing.  Will Kohei let Shingo see him at his most vulnerable, or will he keep his door locked forever?
. . . . Thanks to a life marked by one tragedy after another, bitter Kohei is certain that he'll never know true love.  However, his brother-in-law Shingo can't help but fall for the very man who despises him!  In order to survive, these two men must admit to their secret wishes and face their deepest fears . . . together!
(from June back cover)

When his parents abruptly disappear, Daichi is shocked to find himself appointed to take his father's place! Yozora, the beautiful student council President, is convinced that she's destined to be with Daichi, thanks to a fake TV psychic. This pits Daichi against a jealous student council at the same time he has to deal with a resentful teacher who keeps trying to engage Daichi in bouts of wizardry. title: Double Sensei Life
synopsis:
After transferring to a new school our hero is trying to find a new place to live (with the help of his parents). He finds a posting of a woman wanting a couple of roommates. When he responds he finds that one position has already been filled. Feeling that time is running out, he heads over to find that the women are in fact total bishoujo. Not only that, but they teach at the same school he's going too. How will he hold up; living with the very women who grade/judge him in his daily life? He has only about three weeks until he can find another place to live.

title: Shitsuji Senyou.
synopsis:
When he was young, Satori couldn't handle the pressures of the noble lifestyle that the Matsunomiya name came with. As such, Satori's parents decided to lead an average life for his sake. However, after his parents' lives were taken in an accident and his grandfather passed away, Satori was appointed the head of the Matsunomiya family. Now, Master Satori must fix his posture, dining etiquette, and education to become a fitting head. What's worse, relationships between the family and the staff are prohibited. Not only does Satori have to change his entire nature, he must do it with the love of his life, whom he is not allowed to touch, at his every beck and call!

(Source: Torico)

title: Demonion 2
synopsis:
The nomadic people founded four countries on the once barren Nilt region. They were the Elven kingdom of Lusario, the Eastern empire Shuka, the ice empire Kilos and the dark demon kingdom of Hados. However, Hados collapsed due to an instigated revolt by the humans. One hundred years later, the Diabolica were viewed as bringers of destruction and chaos, and as such, they were a target of discrimination and suppression.

Caym was a Diabolica prince who survived the fall of Hados in a remote place. A girl named Risbell visited him and pleaded for him to revive Hados to save the Diabolica, and to avenge the deaths of her parents by human hands. He proclaimed that he would defeat the three countries and make their respective queens his servants.

The scene is Tokyo in 2031 AD.  The world has become too polluted for the majority of the people to live without special shields to protect the air they breathe.  Kou, Rika, and Dariru, however, still live in the streets b/c they are genetically stronger than the majority and can withstand the stronger UV rays and the dirty air.  They are part of the rebel underground community.  One day, Kou discovers another secret.  A ring that he received from his scientist father seems to have special powers...  Who is this girl that he is now in contact with and why does she know so much about him??

At the end of this tankoubon volume is another one shot titled "Magic Out" about two childhood friends, Hideaki and Kanako, and a mysterious plant that Kanako accidentally breeds at her house's flowershop greenhouse.

They are the waters at the end of the world above. Every river, every lake, every ocean; all water arrives here, Protecting the ends of the world and the city which longs for it, Klinia Roe. On a green hill lies the representation of peace and harmony. The world is ruled by the Higher Prince, Al El. His brother, Serlhon, and an adventurer from the world below begin their journey.
Serlhon admires Ashrei and believes that he is the only one who can free him from monotony. Exactly one year ago, Ashrei and a man-beast, Hephaistos, arrived in this world. Different from the Klinia people and Serlhon, Ashrei Rodd possesses dark hair and eyes of a mysterious light.
During his journey with the strong and manly Ashrei, how will Serlhon grow? What secrets does Ashrei hide?

The sword, Ekwedra, is a legendary sword. It is said that the very first creator of the world was using Ekwedra. Ekwedra has its own will and will only be controlled by those who have purest blood of Dragon clan. Even having purest blood of Dragon Clan, all went berserk as they held the Ekwedra. However, few, very few cases, there were persons who could not be overruled by Ekwedra.
Apparently, Sarision is one of those who wouldn't be controlled by Ekwedra and go berserk.

Sachiko Ameya, age 80, was enjoying life in her old age happily and peacefully. However, what filled her heart at her moment of death was a strong regret for her cowardice in dying without reconciling with the important people in her life.

"There are still so many people I want to see. I want to live."

Sachiko suddenly became 18 years old again, and she began her second life with unsteady steps.

To resist these belligerent nations, Ishito Suzuki takes to the skies once more! Etorouji Shiono's flying boat war chronicles debut here!

Natsuki's interest in the high schooler is piqued after Yuuya happens to be passing through the scene of a difficult murder case and determines the perpetrator with ease. How did he know who the killer was? When an incident later takes place at Yuuya's high school, the two happen across each other again... Thus, a young policeman and a high schooler with a hidden power begin unraveling the mystery!

This refined and dignified man is the 2nd prince of Castile, Prince Stephen! Josh's father, who was the crown prince of the Kingdom of Castile had passed away, and the prince claims Josh is the rightful heir to the throne. "I'll never hand over my son!" Standing by her promise to her friend, Mandy decides to do everything in her power to stop the prince.

In fact, the bride has already been chosen: none other than Takasugi's sister!

Amidst all the confusion, will Sentarou end up eating his promise of trying to do everything he can to make Sakamoto happy? And what about all the other couples? The couplings of Takasugi x Ogata, Shikibu x Tsutsumi, Todoroki x Takeru and Kitasenju x Juujou all collide in this volume—with babies in-tow! It's one riot of a manga indeed!

However, when Fujimi catches a glimpse of Shinanai's beloved Ryuuko, who has been chosen to play the princess in the school's stage play, he decides to pursue her. The two Undeadmen find themselves in a battle to death for the maiden's heart. There are just two problems: they are both immortal...and she can't stand either of them.

synopsis:
【Officially】This is a story of where a small girl was discovered to be the King’s illegitimate child, was supplied with a robust army of soldiers called Dog People and governs over the country.

（【In reality】A loner child with no charm, at a level where she would trip and fall from being lead by a medium sized dog, gets put in charge of leading a great number of mad dogs and until she can properly hold her ground, this is about the difficulty of her walk.） (Source: NU)

title: Beast of Blood
synopsis:
There are humans in this world that have evolved with the blood of humans and beasts. They are categorized as vampires, lycans and sirens, and retain their unique ecology and gender.

(Source: MU)

1-2. Koi ni Naru Mae ni (Before You Fall in Love)

title: Aliens
synopsis:
Thirteen-year-old Ai Kiyomiya has always been told to act normal in order to receive love and affection from her callous mother. However, this simple task is a tall order for Ai when a person suddenly falls from the sky and gets run over by a truck in front of her eyes. Ai tries to calm herself down, but the mysterious arrival pleads her not to call the "humans" as she heals herself.

The being calls herself "Nike" and is part of an intergalactic species known as "Entity A"—often labeled as one of humanity's worst natural predators. Unwilling to turn in Nike for execution, Ai hides her in an abandoned factory but finds that Nike would rather spend time with her than anything else. As their illegal friendship begins to blossom, Ai slowly comes to terms with her own warped perception of love with Nike's help.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

synopsis:
Takayuki Yamano is a boy who simply wishes to break away from his family's tradition, running Yamano Inn, which is a hot spring resort where the most beautiful girls come from miles around for vacation time. One could easily question his sanity, as did his employers. Being rejected for the millionth time, he sadly returns to Yamano Inn to work as manager/butler. You've got three days to choose to follow and woo the girl of your choice.

(Source: VNDB)

title: Okubyou na Megami
synopsis:
Her past was a dark country

And Iantha Kethley was trapped at its borders, never quite able to escape the one defining moment of her life. Until the day she held Robert Armstrong at gunpoint—and he offered her a future she'd never dared imagine!

Rob Armstrong, Lord Duncan, swore he'd not be mere protector of Iantha Kethley, but true partner as well, for this sweetly vulnerable woman had a spine of surprising steel—a necessary attribute to face the danger that stalked her still. Her need drew him to her; her courage held him by her side—where he'd willingly remain, bound by honor, passion... and love!

(Source: MU)

title: Sensei wa Yoiko
synopsis: Yoiko has been looking forward to cutting back on her job at the love hotel and starting her new position as a highschool teacher. She is good person- as her name suggests. Strong, blunt and a hardworker, thanks to her days being a handball champion. Upon starting work at a local highschool, she recognises the class captain Izuru, as someone who had brought a beautiful woman to the love hotel... except it turns out the beautiful woman was actually Daisuke; a handsome, rich, popular and incredibly flirtatious boy from another highschool. Daisuke begins to pursue Yoiko who now has to juggle her new career, Daisuke's advances and past love.

title: Andou Natsu: Edo Wagashi Shokunin Monogatari

alternative_titles.ja: あんどーなつ 江戸和菓子職人物語

synopsis:
Ando Natsu, whose dream is to become a patissiere, finds herself jobless after the shop owner's sudden death. She goes to Tokyo in search of another job at a confectionery but the recruiting period has just ended and there are no available positions. This is when she makes her first encounter with the well-established Japanese confectionery "Mangetsudo". It is run by the veteran confectioner Umekichi, Takezo, and Mitsuko, and they happened to be looking for a part-time worker. A number of chance events follow and Natsu starts working at Mangetsudo. Although her job is to serve customers, Natsu becomes interested in the world of Japanese confection. Having only worked in cake shops, everything is new to her and she is gradually drawn into the deepness and profoundness of Japanese confection.

(Source: MU)

title: Oh! My Konbu Middle
synopsis:
The original gourmet manga centered on Konbu, a boy who helps out in his father's restaurant. In the new manga, Konbu is now a middle-aged man.

(Source: ANN)

alternative_titles.ja: ヘヴンズ・ダイアリー

title: Assobot Goku
synopsis:
From Boku-Tachi:

Assobot Goku is the strongest and worst assobot there is, and he and his gang take what they want without remorse. But when he sets his sights on Miroku Village, and meets up with a mysterious young man named Sanzou playing a strange harmonica, he gets more than he bargained for. How does Sanzou know about Goku, and how are they both connected with a prophecy foretelling the destruction of the world? "Assobot Goku" first appeared in Weekly Shounen Magazine in issue 4/5 2002, and has since then been made into an animated series called "Assobot Senki Goku" (The Assobot Fighting Chronicles, Goku).

title: Doutei Jigoku
synopsis: Michisada Mada was killed in a traffic accident, but since he died a virgin, he can neither go to Heaven or Hell. His only destination is Virgin Hell where he must lose his virgin spirit.

title: Saigo no Ω wa Tsugai ni Narenai

synonyms: Saigo no Omega wa Tsugai ni Narenai
alternative_titles.ja: 最後のΩは番になれない

synopsis:
There was a widespread virus that could only infect Omegas. There was only one Omega who had survived in the whole world, an Omega that had natural antibodies against the virus, Shuu Miyamoto. He was then isolated by a government research institution and was forced to have children with Alphas. However, the Alpha who was chosen one day, Honda, was different from anyone else so far as Shuu went into heat the moment their eyes met...! Honda, who was following his natural instincts as an Alpha, and Shuu, who was drowning in lust. Even though Shuu knew this person in front of him was his fated partner, the relationship between these two, who could not become partners for life is...

(Source: Core Magazine, translated)

title: Chikkoi! Sora-chan to Kou-kun no 20 cm Sa no Koi

alternative_titles.ja: ちっ恋！ ～空ちゃんと光くんの20cm差の恋～
シュガーポットへようこそ

title: Sakurairo no Kizuato
synopsis:
Just one family photo. It was a moment of happiness for Kano. Five-year-old Kano was never allowed to step out of her room and spent her days being abused by her mother. One day, her mother brings home a man and says, "Here's your new daddy. And then her younger sister, Rino, is born, but in addition to her mother's abuse, her father also begins to beat her. Her father abandoned her mother, and her mother also left, leaving her two young children behind. With no one to turn to for help, the sisters are starving and lonely, and their lives are in danger?　From neglectful parents to an orphanage. The harsh fate of the young sisters is depicted!

(Source: Booklive, translated)

title: Maid Shokun!
synopsis:
Ever wondered about the inner workings of a Maid Cafe? Maybe you've wondered how the "maids" are like before or after work? Or perhaps you've wondered how they deal with a job where pleasing the customer is their priority? Well, enter a delicate, attractive girl who gets convinced, and sucked into such a job, and see this light-hearted story unfold!

(Source: MU)

title: Sentou Megami Anunga
synopsis: When Urabe Takuma is caught in a incident with a monster, Anunga, the battle goddess saves him.

title: Mou Hitori no Watashi
synopsis:
On a hill in a wealthy residential neighbourhood, with kind parents and plenty of good friends, the cheerful girl Kahoko, nicknamed "Kako," lives happily. One day, due to the sudden death of her father, that life completely changes. A beautiful girl named Naoko moves into Kako's old house, and Kako's heart is filled with trouble. Naoko lives with a little secret that she doesn't want anybody to know. But Kako stumbles onto Naoko's secret by accident, and afraid that Naoko might steal the heart of Kako's first-love Noboru. So Kako, in front of Noboru... tries to reveal Naoko's secret... This is the story of how a girl grows up, surprised and perplexed, with budding jealousy and envy in a complex struggle of the heart.

(Source: M-U)

title: Miss Boys!
synopsis:
Sakamoto Masami is in his first year of high school and the ace of the basketball club. Because of his asocial behavior, his coach tells him to temporarily join the school's cheer leading club to increase his team spirit. Soon he finds out this isn't your average cheer leading club. All of sudden Masami is facing the choice to either put his male pride aside and dress up as a girl, or to never return to the basketbal club.

(Source: MU)

title: Danshi Chuugakusei ni Mamakatsu Shitai Joshikousei no Ohanashi

alternative_titles.ja: 男子中学生にママ活したい女子高生のおはなし

synopsis: The story of a middle school boy cooperating with his friend's cousin to help her experience what it's like being a mother.

title: Himekoi
synopsis:
In Crescent Moon Village, where high school students Mikata and Kuro live, the descendants of a fox clan that saved the village from starvation in the past and the descendants of a fox's bride hold a marriage ceremony at the annual summer festival to mingle and protect the village from disaster. As the descendants of the same family, Mikata and Kuro are supposed to take over the role this summer. However, unlike him, who believes in the village customs, Kuro seems to be completely unwilling to do anything. What will happen to the love between the childhood friends who suffer from the village custom of marriage between men?

(Source: Hakusensha, translated)

title: Last Boss Temae no Inarisou: Saikyou Ooyasan Tsuite〼

もっといちゃつきたいの

title: God Bless You
synopsis:
Marriage is not on her agenda! When a two-time mixed martial arts champion dies and wakes up in the body of the petite Lady Grace Rambler, she quickly decides to make the best of things—to attract a so-called "unicorn man," the rare kind of gentleman who's modest, exciting, and handsome! But her dreams are crushed when she finds out Grace is set to marry Duke Aston Blade, a perverted and ugly old geezer... Or is he?! Not willing to risk it, she rejects the marriage and sticks to her guns. It's either a unicorn man or bust!

(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Nya~n!
synopsis: Shiina lives within the temple's area and she can sense spirit. Whenever there's some spirit nearby, her breasts will  be lifted up by themselves. One day, she and her friend accidentally moved the tombstone in the temple's graveyard, waking up the cat demon who is trapped down there.

title: Night=Hawks!
synopsis:
Set during the One Year War, it follows the story of young officer 1st Sgt. Brown Chaamin, who is part of the Earth Federation Forces' "Night Hawks" 13th independent shock troops. This force is composed of pseudo-Newtype (reinforced by drug administration) mobile suit pilots, and outfitted with specially modified machines. This unit was formed as part of the V-RX program.

(Source: Gundam Wikia)

title: Ichika Nikki
synopsis:
Volume 3 - This is a story about a cat who lives with her wonderful owner, his not so loved boyfriend, a savage bird, and now a Corgi puppy. Can life be any more annoying?

(Source: Yes_Rhade)
